name: ralrimivv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w1))

-| diffsw(s0, w0)

-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: Inference from Theorem 19.21 of [Margaris] p. 90. (Restricted quantifier version with double quantification.) (Contributed by NM, 24-Jul-2004.)
